summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6186 for the improvement of The Alley in Block 2, Norris Sand Point Addition, being the alley between 52nd Avenue Northeast and 54th Avenue Northeast from 68th Street to East 70th Street; and certain other alleys, by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 87227, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
